about_the_game:
Introducing Furball Blitz!


Embark on a wild multiplayer PvP where adorable animals wield guns and face off in intense battles!
Furball Blitz offers fast-paced combat and allows you to team up with friends to form squads of up to 4 players.



Weapons Galore


Weapons are divided into 4 tiers based on performance, with a current arsenal boasting over 30 unique options.

From pistols to machine guns, bazookas, and drone bombers, even MIRV...
Players can arm themselves with a variety of unconventional weapons rarely seen in typical FPS games.

With the ability to carry up to 4 weapons at once, dynamic combat scenarios await, offering thrilling encounters where players can tackle enemies using a range of peculiar armaments.



Variety of game modes


Furball Blitz offers a variety of game modes to suit every player's preferences.
Engage in Death Match mode where the goal is to be the first to eliminate a set number of opponents, team up with friends in Team Death Match mode for intense 3v3v3 or 4v4 battles, or dominate the battlefield in Zone Domination mode where capturing and holding territories is key to victory.

And more modes will be added in future updates!



Join the Furballs Fray


Whether you're a lone wolf or part of a pack, Furball Blitz provides non-stop action and excitement for players of all skill levels.
So grab your weapons, rally your friends, and get ready to unleash furry mayhem in Furball Blitz!
